page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
hour of school reading.After school we have clubs such as violin,art,maths, cookery and science which are all fun. If I stay to a club I go home at 4.00 otherwise I go home at 3.15.When I get home I do my homework or revision and then play tennis or watch{television. We have dinner around 7.00 and I go to bed at about 9.00.
I usually wake up at about 7.30.I put on my dressing gown and play with Murdoch my hamster.I go down to the living room for breakfast with my mum, dad and sister at 7.45.After breakfast I go upstairs and dress in my school uniform which consists of a grey skirt,a white shirt,a blue tie and a grey sweatshirt with a picture of the school on the front.When I am dressed I brush my teeth and hair.I then go back downstairs and put my lunch in my
